title.rendered: Three Seniors Named National Merit Finalists

content.rendered:
Three Saratoga Springs High School seniors were recently named finalists in the 2024 National Merit Scholarship Program.  Congratulations to Ava Agati,  Kaitlin Munro, and Carol Wang.

High school students enter the competition by taking the PSAT/National Merit Scholarship Qualifying Test which serves as an initial screen of about 1.6 million entrants each year. The nationwide pool of finalists represents less than one percent of U.S. high school seniors and includes the highest-scoring entrants in each state.
